Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: ta.Ha
asim kura'ana tuhade upara isa la'i nahim utari'a ki tusim musibata vica pai ja'u
Balaki isa vica ajihe bade la'i upadesa hai jihara darada hove
Iha usa valom utari'a gi'a hai jisa ne dharati ate uce akasam nu paida kita
Uha rahimata vala hai ate uca sighasana ute birajamana hai
Jo kujha akasam vica hai, dharati upara hai, dovam de vicakara hai jam dharati de thale hai, sabha usa (alaha) da hai
Ate tusim caho apani gala uci pukara ke kaho para uha hauli kiti ho'i gala nu vi janada hai. Ate isa tom vadha hauli kiti gala nu vi
Uha alaha hai usa tom' binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Sare cage nama use de hana
Ate ki tuhanu musa di gala pahuci hai
Jadom ki usa ne dekhi hai ate asa hai maim usa vicom tuhade la'i ika agara li'avam jam usa aga de kola mainu raha da pata mila ja'e
Phira jadom uha usa de kola pahuci'am tam avaza diti ga'i ki hai musa
maim hi tera raba ham isa la'i tusim apani'am juti'am utara di'u ki'unki tusim tuva di pavitara ghati vica ho
Ate maim tuhanu cuna li'a hai isa la'i jihari vahi prakasi ja rahi hai usa nu suna
Maim hi alaha ham. Mere binam ko'i pujanayaunga nahim. Isa la'i tusi' meri hi ibadata karom. Meri yada la'i namaza sathapita karo
Besaka ki'amata a'unna vali hai. Mai' usa nu gupata rakhana cahuda ham tam ki hareka vi'akati nu usa de kite da fala mila sake
Isa la'i tuhanu uha bada asavadhana na kara deve. Jo isa upara imana nahim li'a'unda ate apani'am ichavam da palana karada hai, tam ki tusim nasata ho ja'um
Ate he musa! Iha tuhade hatha vica ki hai
Usa ne akhi'a, iha meri danga hai. Maim isa upara teka rakhada ham ate isa nala apani'am bakari'am la'i pate jharada ham. Isa nala mere duje kama vi hude hana
Farama'i'a, he musa! Isa nu dharati te rakha di'u
Usa ne isa nu (dharati te)rakha dita tam acanaka uha ika ringada ho'i'a sapa bana gi'a
Farama'i'a, ki isa nu phara lavom, daro na. Asim phira isa nu isa di pahili halata vica li'a devange
Ate tusi apana hatha apani kacha vica de lavom uha binham kise vikara de camakada ho'i'a nikalega. Iha duji nisani hai
Tam ki asim vadi'am nisani'am vicom kujha nisani'am tuhanu dikha'i'e
Tusim phira'auna de kola ja'um, uha hadam tom bahara nikala gi'a hai
Musa ne kiha, he mere palanahara! Mere dila nu mere la'i khaul'ha ve
Ate mere kama nu mere la'i saukha kara de
Ate meri zubana di'am gadham khaul'ha de
Tam ki loka meri gala samajhana
Ate mere parivara tom mere la'i ika saha'ika niyukata kara de
Haruna nu, jihara mera bhara hai
Usa rahi' meri kamara nu mazabuta kara de
Ate usa nu mere kama vica bha'ivala bana de
Tam ki asim dovem bahuta zi'ada teri pavitarata da varanana kara saki'e
Ate hora zi'ada teri caraca kari'e
Besaka tu sanu dekha riha hai
Farama'i'a gi'a, ki he musa! De dita gi'a jo tu magi'a
Ate asim tuhade upara ika vara hora upakara kita hai
Jadom ki asim tuhadi mam de vala vahi bheji, jihari vahi diti ja rahi hai

Ki isa (musa) nu saduka vica rakho. Phira isa nu nadi vica vaha di'u, phira nadi isa nu kinare upara lai ave. Isa nu ika vi'akati cuka lavega jihara mera vi dusamana hai ate isa da vi. Ate maim apane valom tuhade upara ika saneha pa dita hai. Tam ki tusim meri nigarani vica palana posana prapata karo

Jadom ki tuhadi bhaina caladi ho'i jihara isa bace da palana pausana cagi tar'ham kare. Isa la'i asim tuhanu tuhadi mam de vala vapisa bheja dita tam ki usa di'am akham thadhi'am rahina ate usa nu dukha na hove. Ate tusim ika bade di hati'a kara diti, phira asim tuhanu isa dukha vicom baî€¼ba'i'a. Ate asim' tuhanu cagi tar'ham parakhi'a. Phira tusim ka'i sala madayana vali'am vica rahe. Phira tusim ika adaje upara a ga'e, he musa
ate maim tuhanu apane la'i zuni'a
Ja'o, tusi ate tuhada bhara meri'am nisani'am de nala. Ate tusi' dovem meri yada vica alasa na karana
Tusim' dovem phira'auna de kola ja'u, uha vidarohi ho gi'a hai
Isa la'i usa nala nimarata puravaka gala karana, ho sakada hai uha nasihata savikara kare jam dara jave
Dovam ne kiha, he sade palanahara! Sanu dara hai ki uha sade upara zulama na kare jam sada virodha karana lage
Farama'i'a ki tusim darom na maim tuhade dovam de nala ham. Tuhanu suna ate dekha riha ham

Isa la'i tusi' usa de kola ja'u ate kaho ki asim dovem tere raba de bheje ho'e ham. Isa la'i tu isara'ila di satana nu sade nala janade ate unham te zulama na kara. Asim tere raba de kolom ika nisani vi li'a'e ham. Ate salamati usa bade la'i hai jihara cage raha da palana kare
Sade upara iha vahi prakasita kiti ga'i hai ki usa bade nu saza milegi jihara isa nu jhuthalave jam isa tom muha maure
Phira'aina ne kiha, he musa! Tuhade dovam da raba kauna hai
Musa ne kiha sada raba uha hai jisa ne hara ika vasatu nu usa di sakala pradana kiti phira maraga darasana kita
Phira'ana ne kiha, phira pahilam di'am kaumam di sathiti ki hai
Musa ne kiha, ki isa da gi'ana tam mere raba de kaula ika dafatara vica hai. Mera raba na galati karada hai ate na bhulada hai

Uha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i dharati da pharasa bana'i'a ate usa vica tuhade la'i raha bana'e ate akasa vicom pani utari'a. Phira asim usa de rahim alaga alaga tar'ham di'am banasapati'am paida kiti'am
Kha'o ate apane dagara cara'u. Isa de adara budhimana lokam la'i nisani'am hana
Isa nala asim' tuhanu paida kita hai ate isa de vica hi asim tuhanu vapisa morange ate ise tom hi asim tuhanu phira kadhange
Ate asim _phira'auna nu apani'am sari'am nisani'am dikha'i'am ate usa ne jhuthala'i'a ate inakara kita
Usa ne kiha hai musa! Ki tusim isa la'i sade kola a'e ho ki apane jadu nala sanu sade desa vicom kadha devo

Tam asim tuhade mukabale vica ajiha hi jadu li'avange. Isa la'i tusim sade ate apane vicakara ika va'ada niradharita kara lavo na asi' usa de virudha ja'i'e na tusim. Iha mukabala ika padhare maidana vica hove
Musa ne kiha, tuhade la'i va'ade da dina mele vala dina hai ate iha loka dina carhana taka ikathe kara la'e jana
Phira'auna uthom gi'a phira apane sare da'a-peca ikathe kite, isa tom ba'ada uha mukabale la'i a gi'a
Musa ne kiha, tuhada sura hovega, alaha upara jhutha na marho ki uha tuhanu kise afata du'ara khatama kara deve. Ate jisa ne alaha upara jhutha marhi'a uha asafala ho'i'a
Phira unham ne apane mamale vica apasi matabheda kita ate unham ne cori cori apisa vica salaha kiti
Unham ne kiha iha dove yakinana jadugara hana. Uha cahude hana ki apane jadu di sakati nala tuhanu tuhade desa vicom kadha dena ate tuhadi adarasa pranali da khatama kara dena
Isa la'i tusi apani'am sakimam ikathi'am karo. Phira ika juta ho ke a'u, uhi jita javega jihara aja prabhavi rahega
Unham ne kiha ki he musa! Jam tam tusim suto jam asim pahilam sutana vale bani'e
Musa ne kiha, ki tusim hi pahilam suto, tam acanaka unham di'am rasi'am ate unham di'am dangam unham di jadu di takata nala usa nu isa tar'ham vikha'i diti'am mano uha bhaja rahi'am hona
Isa la'i musa apanai dila vica chara gi'a
Asim kiha ki tusi daro na tusim prabhavi rahoge

Ate jihara tuhade saje hatha vica hai tusim usa nu suta devo, uha unham nu nigala ja'ega jihara unham ne bana'i'a hai. Jihara kujha unham bana'i'a hai iha jadugari da dhaukha hai ate jadugara kade safala nahi huda cahe uha kiho jiha vi hovo
Isa la'i jadugara sijade vica lame pai ga'e. Unham ne kiha asim haruna ate musa de palanahara upara imana li'a'e ham

Phira'aina ne kiha tusim meri agi'a tom' binham isa nu mana li'a ki iha hi tuhada vada hai, jisa ne tuhanu jadu sikha'i'a hai tam huna maim tuhade hatha paira ulati'am disavam vica katavanvaga ate mai' tuhanu khajura de tani'am upara phahe lavanga. Ate tusim jana lavauge ki sade vicom kisa di saza zi'ada daradanaka hai ate zi'ada dera taka rahina vali hai

Jadugaram ne akhi'a ki asim tuhanu kade vi unham dalilam upara pradhanata nahim dide jihare sade kola a'e hana ate usa hasati de uparom vi (pradhanatam nahim dide) jisa ne sanu paida kita hai. Isa la'i tu jo karana hai kara lai. Tu jo kujha kara sakada haim isa sasarika jivana vica him kara sakada hai
Asim apane raba te imana li'a'e tam ki uha sade papam nu mu'afa kara deve ate isa jadu nu vi jisa la'i tu sanu majabura kita. Ate alaha sarava sresata hai ate hamesa rahina vala hai
Besaka jihara bada aparadhi bana ke apane raba de sahamane hazira hovega usa la'i naraka hai. Uha usa vica na mara sakega ate na ji'um' sakega
Ate jihara bada apane raba de kola momina bana ke avega ate jisa ne cage karama kite honage tam ajihe lokam la'i bari'am uci'am padavi'am hana
Unham la'i hamesam rahina vale baga hana jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am, uha usa vica hamesam rahinage ate iha fala hai usa bade la'i jihara pavitarata nu apanave

Ate asim musa upara vahi prakasi ki uha rata de samem mere badi'am nu lai ke nikale phira unham la'i samudara vica suka maraga bana lavo. Tusim picha karana vali'am tom na darom ate na him kise hora ciza tom daro
Phira phira'auna ne apani'am phaujam nala unham da picha kita phira unham nu samudara de pani ne dhaka li'a
Ate phira'auna ne apani kauma nu gumaraha kita ate unham nu yoga raha na dikha'i'a
He isara'ila di aulada! Asim tuhanu tuhade dhusamanam tom mukati diti ate tuhade nala tura de saje vala va'ada kita. Ate asim tuhade upara mana ate salava utare
Kha'u sadi diti ho'i pavitara rozi ate usa la'i vidaroha na karo tam ki tuhade upara mera krodha na hove. Ate jisa upara mera krodha huda hai uha khatama ho janda hai
Ham tiki'a rahe tam usa la'i maim bahuta zi'ada mu'afi bakhasana vala ham
Ate he musa! Apani kauma nu chada ke jaladi a'una la'i tuhanu kisa ciza ne prerita kita
Musa ne kiha uha loka vi mere piche hi hana. Ate he mere palanahara! Maim tere vala jaladi isa la'i a gi'a tam ki tu prasana hovem
Farama'i'a, tam asim tuhadi kauma nu tuhade tom ba'ada ika imatihana vica pa dita ate samari ne unham nu gumaraha kara dita

Phira musa apani kauma vala dukha ate guse de bhare vapisa mure. Usa ne kiha he meri kauma! Ki tuhade nala tuhade raba ne ika caga va'ada nahim kita si. Ki tuhanu lama samam ho gi'a hai. Jam tusim cahi'a ki tuhade upara tuhade raba da krodha pragata hove isa la'i tusim apana vacana tora dita

Unham ne kiha ki asim apani icha nala tuhade nala visavasaghata nahim kita balaki kauma de gahini'am da bhara sade tom zukava'i'a gi'a si tam asim usa nu suta dita. Phira isa tarham samari ne dhala li'a
Isa la'i usa ne unham la'i ika vacha bana dita, ika ajihi murati jisa vicom balada varagi avaza nikaladi si. Phira usa ne kiha iha tuhada pujanayoga hai ate musa da vi. Musa isa nu kula ga'e
Ki uha vekhade nahim' si ki na uha kise gala da utara cida hai na uha ko'i labha de sakada hai na hani pahuca sakada hai
Ate haruna ne unham nu pahilam hi kiha si ki he meri kauma! Tusim isa vade de rahim gumaraha ho ga'e hom. Tuhada raba tam rahimana hai. Isa la'i meri sarana lavo ate meri agi'a palana karo
Unham ne kiha ki asim tam ise di hi puja vica lage rahange jada taka cira musa sade kola vapisa na jave
Musa ne kiha, he haruna! Jadom' tu dekhi'a ki iha bhataka ga'e hana tam tuhanu kisa ciza ne roki'a ki tusim mere hukama da palana karom
Ki tusim mere kahina de virudha kita
Haruna ne kiha, he meri mam de bete! Tu meri dari ate sira na pharha. Mainu bhara si ki tusi kahoge ki tusim bani isara'ila de vica phuta pa diti ate meri gala ca dhi'ana na rakhi'a
Musa ne kiha, ki he samari! Tuhada ki masala hai

Usa ne kiha mainu uha ciza dikha'i diti jihari duji'am nu vikha'i nahim didi. Tam maim rasula de pada cinham vicom ika muthi zuki ate isa vica suta diti. Mare mana ne him mainu ajiha karana la'i prerita kita

Susa ne akhi'a, cura ho ja. Huna tere la'i jivana bhara iha hi (saza hai) ki tu kahida rahem mainu na d'uho. Ate tere la'i ika hora va'ada iha hai jihara tere tom talana vala nahim. Ate tu apane isa pujaka nu dekha jisa upara tu lagatara masata ho'i'a tiki'a rahida si. Asim usa nu sarange phira usa nu nadi vica khilara ke vaha devange
Tuhada pujanayoga tam sirapha alaha hai usa tom binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Usa da gi'ana hareka vasatu upara cha'i'a ho'i'a hai
Isa tar'ham asim tuhanu unham de hala suna'unde ham jihare pahilam ho cuke hana. Ate asim tuhanu apane kolom ika maraga darasana di kitaba diti hai
Jo isa tom bemukha hovega uha ki'amata de dina bhari bojha uthavega
Uha usa vica hamesam rahinage ate iha bojha ki'amata de dina unham la'i bahuta mara sabita hovega
Jisa dina maham sakha vica phuka mari javegi ate aparadhi'am nu usa dina asim isa halata vica ikatha karange ki dara nala unham di'am akham nili'am ho janagi'am
Apisa vica hauli-hauli kahide honage ki tusim sirafa dasa dina rahe hovenge
Asim cagi tar'ham janade ham jo kujha uha kahinage. Jadom ki unham da sabha tom zi'ada samajha rakhana vala bada kahega ki tusim sirafa ika dina (duni'am vica) ruke
Ate loka tuhade tom paharam de sabadha vica puchade hana. Akho, ki mera raba inham nu khilara devega
Phira dharati nu padhara maidana bana ke chada devega
Tusim usa vica kau'i viga nahim dekhoge ate na ko'i uca ninva

Usa dina sare loka pukarana vale de piche cala painage. Bhora matara vi ko'i viga vala nahim hovega. Sari'am avazam rahimana de age daba janagi'am. Tusim ika sarasarahata tom' binham kujha nahim sunauge
Usa dina sipharisa kama na avegi paratu ajiha bada jisa nu rahimana ne agi'a diti hove ate usa la'i bolana pasada kita hove
Uha sari'am de agale ate pichale hala nu janada hai ate unham da gi'ana usa nu ghere vica nahim lai sakada
Ate sare cihare usa jivita ate sadivi sata de sahamane jhuke honage. Ate ajiha bada asafala hovega, jihara na inasaphi lai ke a'i'a hove
Ate jisa ne cage kama kite honage ate uha imana vi rakhada hovega tam usa nu na kise zi'adati da dara hovega ate na hi kise ghate da
Ate isa tar'ham asim arabi vica kura'ana utari'a hai ate tam ki loka darana, jam iha unham de dilam vicaî€¼ kujha soca pa deve
Tam alaha hi asali sasaka ate sresata hai ate tusim kura'ana de laina vica jaladi na karo jadom taka usa di vahi sapurana na ho ja'e ate kaho ki he mere palanahara! Mere gi'ana vica vadha kara
Ate asim adama nu isa tom pahilam hukama dita si tam uha bhula gi'a ate asim usa vica ika mazabuta sakalapa na dekhi'a
Ne sijada kita paratu ibalisa ne inakara kara dita
Phira asim kiha ki he adama! Iha besaka tuhada ate tuhadi patani da dusamana hai rahi ja'uge
Ithe tuhade la'i iha hai ki na tusim bhukhe rahoge ate nam nage
Ate ithe na tusim pi'ase hovonge ate na tuhanu dhupa lagegi
Phira saitana ne unham nu bahika'i'a. Usa ne kiha ki he adama! Ki mai tuhanu hamesam rahina vale darakhata da pata dasam. Ate ika raja da vi jisa da kade nasa nahim' huda

Isa la'i unham dovam ne usa darakhata da fala kha li'a tam unham dovam de gupata aga ika dusare de sahamane khul'ha ga'e. Ate dovem apane nu janata de bagam de pati'am de nala dhakana laga pa'e. Ate adama ne apane raba de hukama di ulaghana kiti tam uha bhataka ga'e
Phira usa de raba ne unham upara kirapa kiti phira unham di tauba savikara kiti ga'i ate phira unham nu nasihata bakhasi

Alaha ne kiha ki tusim dovem ithom utaro. Tusim ika dusare de dusamana hovonge. Phira jekara tuhade kola meri taraphom nasihata ave tam jihara bada meri nasihata da palana karega uha na bhatakega ate na sakhana (khali) rahega
Ate jihara bada mere upadesa tom muha maurega tam usa la'i jivana aukha ho javega ate ki'amata de dina asim usa nu anha karake cukange
Uha kahega ki he mere palanahara! Tu mainu anhe nu ki'um cuki'a maim' tam akham vala si
Kiha javega ki ise tar'ham tere kola sadi'am nisani'am a'i'am tam tu unham upara bhora vi dhi'ana nahim dita isa la'i use tar'ham aja tere upara vi dhi'ana nahim' dita javega

Ate isa tar'ham asim badala devange usa nu jihare hadam para kara jande hana ate apane raba di'am nisani'am upara imana nahim li'a'unde ate praloka di saza bahuta sakhata hai ate hamesa rahina vali hai

Ki lokam nu isa gala nala gi'ana nahim mili'a ki inham tom pahilam asim kine varaga nasata kara dite hana. Iha unham de sahiram vica rahide hana. Besaka isa vica sudhi vali'am la'i vadi'am nisani'am hana
Ate jekara tuhade raba valom ika gala pahilam niyata na ho cuki hudi ate mauke di ika hada niradharita na hudi tam zarura isa da phaisala muka dita janda

Isa la'i iha loka jihara kujha akhade hana, usa upara dhiraja rakho. Ate apane raba di prasasa de sahita upamam karo, suraja nikalana tom pahilam ate suraja dubana tom pahilam, ate rata di'am ghari'am vica vi usa di vadi'a'i karo. Dina de kinari'am te vi (vadi'a'i karo) tam ki tuhanu satusati mile

Ate kade vi unham cizam vala akha cuka ke vi na' dekho, jisa nu asim unham de kujha jathi'am nu unham de imatihana la'i unham nu sasara di sudarata de rakhi hai. Ate tuhade raba da rizaka zi'ada utama hai ate baki rahina vala hai
Ate apane lokam nu namaza da hukama di'um ate usa di pabadi karo. Asim' tuhade tom ko'i rizaka nahim magade. Rizaka tam tuhanu asim devange. Caga sita tam takava (dhiraja rakhana vale) la'i hi hai
Ate loka kahide hana ki iha apane raba tom sade la'i ko'i nisani'am ki'um nahim li'a'unde. Ki unham pasa pichali'am kitabam di dalila nahim' pahuci

Ate jekara asim unham nu isa tom pahilam kise afata nala nasata kara dide tam uha kahide, he sade palanahara! Tu sade kola rasula ki'um na bheji'a tam jo asim apamanita ate saramida hona tom pahilam teri'am nisani'am da palana karade
Akho, ki hara ika udika vica hai, tam tusim vi udika karo. Bhavikha vica tusi jana lavauge ki kauna sidhe raha te calana vala hai ate kauna janata vala raha labhana vala hai
